meanings.definition: Muscles that draw a body part, such as a limb, toward the midline of the body.
meanings.sent1: The adductors help bring the leg back to the center of the body.
meanings.sent2: During exercise, it is important to strengthen the adductors for better stability.
meanings.sent3: The adductors decided to have a race to see who could pull the leg closer to the body faster.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the powerful pull of the adductors, bringing her closer to her goal.
meanings.sent5: The adductors are like the body's inner magnets, always pulling things back to the center.
